name: oligoneuron riddellii
description: Riddell's Goldenrod tolerates and may prefer calcareous soils, which are alkaline with a pH of 7 to 8.  Dormant bare root plants ship each year during optimal transplanting season: Spring (April-May).
features: Pollinator Favorite: butterflies, bees and birds
Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
